entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
